name: HWaterflow
summary: This is a flow layout for UICollectionView.
description:
This is a flow layout for UICollectionView. You can set a array to set a collection view`s layout, this array like that "@[@(3),@(4),@(1)]", these numbers can reflecting structure for your collection view. To set layout, you can set two properties:
    "@property (nonatomic, strong) NSArray * columnForSections"
    or
    "@property (nonatomic, strong) NSArray * rowForSections"
In addiont, you can control the Supplementary Views` heights at the same time.
Sorry for my poor English.
